name: youtube-notes
description: A Chrome Extension for taking quick notes while watching a Youtube video

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/images dist/ && parcel watch --no-hmr src/{content-script.js,styles.css}
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/images dist/ && parcel build src/{content-script.js,styles.css}
